persona.name: Professor Luis Hernandez
persona.description: Professor Luis Hernandez is a 58-year-old academician from Sao Paulo, Brazil, with a master's degree in Biomechanics and a Ph.D. in Biomedical Signal Processing. He has over 25 years of experience in both teaching and research, particularly in the biocompatibility of materials for artificial organs. He is proficient with programming languages used for biomedical data analysis and is a strong advocate of interdisciplinary research that bridges the gap between theoretical and applied biomedical sciences.
